pr_title: Updates Cassandra docker to a newer JRE 1.8

timeline.message:
Updates Cassandra to a newer JRE 1.8

Depends on https://github.com/openzipkin/docker-jre-full/pull/19

timeline.bodyText: just now noticed later we remove both of these regardless of if we installed them!
timeline.author: codefromthecrypt
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -16,7 +16,7 @@
 
 set -eu
 
-echo "*** Installing Python and curl"
+echo "*** Temporarily installing Python and curl"

timeline.bodyText: I verified this manually also, there's no bash things we use here even when doing things like IP lookup
timeline.author: codefromthecrypt
